snippet: Wholesale inventories rose 0.6 percent in April, double the rate in March and exceeding expectations. Stocks, which had fallen early on, then rose.
abstract: Stocks rise, capping their best week so far in 2012; strong performance comes as a relief to investors following a week of big declines.
lead_paragraph: Wholesale inventories rose 0.6 percent in April, double the rate in March and exceeding expectations. Stocks, which had fallen early on, then rose.

headline.main: Stocks Rise as Inventories Show Some Momentum
headline.print_headline: Stocks Rise as Inventories Show Some Momentum
